div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited by Birgit Breuer and revised by Vincenzo Damiani as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung

φερόμεθ’ο• οὐ γὰρ ἔτι ποτ’ ἀμὸν
